name: Facebook App CSS3
description:
Facebook like iPhoneApp

  • New login

  • animations

additional_info: Official sponsor: http://www.noticias.fisioterapiarespiratoria.net/ Updates: 05/12/12 New icons 11/12/12 Left column links more accessible 17/12/12 New Login!! 20/12/12 Troubleshoot compatibility!1 24/12/12 Problems have been solved with the new Facebook update and debugging code. 30/12/12 Debugging code 06/01/13 Correction suggested by the user mikedl.. thank you very much :D !! 20/01/13 New style of Chat Sidebar !! and correction suggested by the user mikedl. thank you !! 21/01/13 New style of Chat (Beta)!! 23/01/13 Compatibility with the applications. 28/01/13 Style chat are in a new style !! style 82251 27/03/13 Troubleshoot logo compatibility and new style buttons on the top bar!! 06/04/13 Solved problem color of names in sidebar! 10/04/13 Solved some bug in on de chat 21/09/13 New style of Newsfeed 25/09/13 Improved ad-blocking filter Remarks: Style chat are in a new style !! style 82251
